name: Six by Six
description:
A submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. Theme: Roll the Dice.

Rules:

At the start of the game, pick a character. Then use the arrow keys to move around the grid of dice. Each character has a limited set of numbers they can step on. Use R to reroll all dice.

Moving and rerolling cost 1 energy each. You are only given 10 energy each turn. You can also spend energy on abilities.

You have a total of four turns each battle to eliminate all enemies on the grid. You can damage enemies by hitting them.
